item.title: 'Just use HTML+CSS, dummy' - Dummy
item.description: Minimalism for the sake of minimalism is an agenda.

item.title: Business programming hybrid roles: The best of both world
item.description: Any role that has a direct business goal that doesn’t involve full time programming to build the product.

item.title: From zero to `deno compile` then back to zero
item.description: Do I still hate Javascript? And yes, Deno is still Javascript don’t let anyone fool ya.

item.title: Do modern hosting services have a sustainable business model?
item.description: There are no hosting company offers a VPS for free. Hosting anything on the web should atleast have some costs associated with them. But why are there free hosting services?
